description: The UniswapV3 Router's exactInputSingle function can leave unused ETH in the router when a price limit is set. The remaining ETH can be stolen by anyone calling the public refundETH() function before the original caller does, resulting in loss of funds for users.
fix_description: Call refundETH() immediately after the swap in the same transaction using multicall. Alternatively, wrap the swap in a contract that automatically refunds remaining ETH to the caller.
